item.title: Chosun Ilbo Economy Update — 2026-01-25 20:03
item.description:
"Unexpected situation... Everyone is wrong" Former Prime Minister Lee Hae-chan passed away
“예상치 못한 상황…모두 오열” 이해찬 전 총리 별세'Lee Hye-hoon's withdrawal' hurriedly... "After watching Lee Hye-hoon's hearing, I decided that it would not work."
‘이혜훈 철회’ 서두른 靑… “이혜훈 청문회 봤더니 안 되겠다 판단”Oh Se-hoon "Lee Hae-chan, the best for the country and the people... I will remember my footsteps"
오세훈 “이해찬, 국가·국민 위해 최선…발자취 기억할 것”Kang Hoon-sik "Lee Hae-chan, dedicate your life to a huge dream... The road I have walked is history"
강훈식 “이해찬, 거대한 꿈에 평생 바쳐…걸어온 길이 역사”'Optimus' is an apprentice... Tesla is now in the robot revolution
‘옵티머스’를 견습생 투입... 테슬라는 지금 로봇혁명중Lee Hae-chan's passing and a procession to commemorate the death of the pan-passport "Living witness to democracy and a giant"

작년에 소비쿠폰 뿌렸는데도 자영업자는 5년만 최대폭 감소..20·30대가 가장 먼저 무너져 From the first generation of the student movement to the Democratic Party's 'kingmaker'... Former Prime Minister Lee Hae-chan passed away in his 7th term
